main event: A witness reported seeing a brilliant light in the shape of a half-circle on the horizon in Gulfport, Mississippi, on September 25, 1955.
interesting points: The light covered a large area with a sharp line of distinction between yellow and blue-reddish portions., A blue shaft of light radiated from the half-circle and flickered three times., The witness covered his face due to the brightness of the light., After one minute, the semi-circle faded to dark red and disappeared., A large number of local people reported observing a bright flash in the sky that night.
witness description: 36 years old, Mississippi, radio and TV technician
